entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
